title: Where did the chroma packs go?
body: So I decided to buy the dragon fist lee chroma pack however I was unable to find it In the in game store, were these limited time only? If so I don't ever recall riot saying they were limited.

replies.body:
Hey TiP Lee sin,

Since these are 'bundles' of skins, they're located under 'Bundles' as opposed to 'Skins.' :]
Any near-future plans for more Chromas?  Like within the coming 1-2 months?
We definitely don't plan to stop making chromas.
Hmm I looked there and there was only the championship skin bundles no chromatic ill have to check again
They are under the bundles section, scroll down and they are at the bottom
